page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: In South Petherton there are two schools.The Infants and the{ Juniors.The bigger is the Juniors with 117 pupils on roll.The Juniors have got two playgrounds and a field to play on when the weather is good.It also has a football pitch and a running track.The school has a football and netball team.The school is about 90 years old,with 4 teachers and a headmaster.To come up to the Junior school you have to be 7 years of age,and when you leave you are 11 years old.You then go to either Stanchester,Westfield or Preston they are the main comprehensive schools but the majority go to Stanchester which takes about 900 pupils.Stanchester is also the nearest school,being 5 kilometres away.The Junior school is made of Hamstone quarried from Hamhill.
